title: Disable Autofill Active Whilst placements are being done
body: Just saying this Function needs to be Disabled while accounts are doing placements Queing Jg TOP getting support is riot disabling and competive play in the sense that what is said person has never played support in there life  it's just not fair id rather wait for hours to get my nominated role then be thrown somewhere i didn't want. especially during placements.....

replies.body: So you can play all your placements in your preferred role, get into a decent elo then lose hard when you have to autofill? Not sure that's any better.

It's already disabled for Promos.

Placements don't matter anyways.
well you see if they were to disable it when people were doing placements queue timers would be really long, and also people play their placements throughout the yr.
